Skilled: +20 Skill ranks
Survivalist: Heal is a class skill/Survival is a class skill
Camouflage (Rogue): 1 min prep using local foliage gives +4 Stealth in same terrain for remainder of day 1/dy
Canny Observer: +4 Perception (hear conversation about concealed items)
Charmer: May take better of 2 Diplomacy rolls 5/dy
Coax Information: May use Bluff or Diplomacy instead of Intimidate to change foe attitude
Expert Leaper: Always gains running start benefit on jumps/Successful DC 15 Acrobatics negates 20' damage on deliberate falls
Fast Fingers: May take better of 2 Sleight Of Hand rolls 5/dy
Fast Picks: May use Disable Device to open lock as a standard action
Fast Tumble: May use Acrobatics to move through threatened square w/out penalty
Follow Clues: May use Perception to follow tracks
Hard To Fool: May take better of 2 Sense Motive rolls 5/dy
Honeyed Words: May take better of 2 Bluff rolls 5/dy
Master Of Disguise: May gain +10 Disguise 1/dy
Nimble Climber: Successful DC +10 Climb check after failed Climb avoids falling
Peerless Maneuver: May take better of 2 Acrobatics rolls 5/dy
Quick Disguise: Reduces time to create effective disguise
Quick Trapsmith: May set CR 10 trap as full-round action
Thoughtful Reexamining: May reroll Knowledge, Perception, or Sense Motive 1/dy
Trapfinding: +10 Perception (traps)/+10 Disable Device (traps)
Combat
Hit Points: 173 Initiative: +3 Armor Class: 14 Attacks Per Round: 3 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +15/+16/+18 Combat Maneuver Bonus/Defense: +16/29
Armor Proficiency: Light Shield Proficiency: None Weapon Proficiency: Simple
Armor: Padded Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun (+18 d2 x2@20 R20'); Gauntlet (+16 d3+1 x2@20); Light Mace (+16 d6+1 x2@20); Unarmed (+16 d3+1 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +60
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Toughness: +20 HP
Another Day: May take 5' step to avoid disabling damage; staggered for 1 rd afterward
Assault Leader: May give immediate attack to flanking ally after missing flanked foe 1/dy
Befuddling Strike: Successful sneak attack inflicts -2 attacks on self for 1d4 rd
Cunning Trigger: R30' May use swift action to trigger self trap
Deadly Cocktail: May apply 2 different poisons or 2 doses of 1 poison (+2 save DC, +50% frequency) to a weapon at once
Deadly Sneak: During full-attack action, may trade -2 attack for treating sneak attack 1s and 2s as 3s
Distracting Attack (Rogue): May forego sneak attack damage to inflict flat-footed vs. chosen ally (Uncanny Dodge neg)
Entanglement Of Blades: Successful sneak attack prevents foe 5' step for 1 rd
Fast Getaway: May make immediate withdraw after successful sneak attack or Sleight Of Hand
Hunter's Surprise: May add sneak attack damage to successful attack on adjacent foe for 1 rd 1/dy
Improved Steal: May perform steal w/out provoking AOO/+2 Steal CMB and CMD
Improved Uncanny Dodge: Cannot be flanked, sneak attack only by rogue level 24+
Knock-Out Blow: May forego sneak attack damage to inflict unconscious for 1d4 rd (DC 21 Fort staggered 1 rd)
Lasting Poison: May apply poison to last 2 attacks; targets gain +2 save
Lookout: When adjacent ally has same feat, may take move and standard actions in surprise round if both self and ally can act; if only ally can act, self gains surprise round action after ally
Lunge: Trade -2 AC for +5' melee range
Master Strike: Sneak attack causes choice of sleep, paralysis, or death (DC 21 Fort neg)
Positioning Attack: May move 30' w/out provoking AOO after successful melee attack, ending adjacent to same foe, 1/dy
Powerful Sneak: During full-attack action, may trade -2 attack for treating sneak attack 1s as 2s
Redirect Attack: May redirect successful hit on self to adjacent creature 1/dy
Sickening Critical: Critical hit causes foe sickened for 1 min
Snap Shot: May make ranged attack at Initiative 20 during surprise round
Sneak Attack: Hit inflicts +10d6 HP when foe flanked or denied Dex bonus
Sniper's Eye: R30' May use ranged sneak attack on concealed foes
Stealthy Sniper: Reduces sniping Stealth penalty to -10
Swift Poison: May apply poison to a weapon as a move action
Uncanny Dodge: Always adds Dex modifier to AC (foe feint neg)
Save: Fortitude: +9; Reflex: +15; Will: +7
Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +3
Iron Will: +2 Will
Wisdom Will Adjustment: -1
Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Trap Sense: +6 Reflex and AC vs. traps

Magic Notes: Sacred Touch: Touch stabilizes
